channel.title: Source Help run.bat
channel.description:
please help me, i click on run.bat and than that says ur server is online now!, but it isnt, i registed on moparscape status checker and i did the regist of my server. than it says it is online but my friends cant connect. why? :confused:
than i tryed other thing, i clicked on server restarte and put 1000 minutes and opens again de page saying my server is online, but my friends cant connect. why?
all is right my server, my port, my client, my java.. only they cant connect on server. thanks ;D

item.title: Source Help run.bat
item.dc:creator: @elitefoda2 elitefoda2
item.description:
@elitefoda2 wrote:

now run bat works but the people is:
i cant connect to server and my friends too, but i see it online on moparscape statuts checker,
i have two computers on my house.
and i dont know what i need to do for this works.
please help me

Read full topic

check the server ip maybe you put it on 127.00.1

item.description:

Read the how to set up a server, in the tutorial section to make sure you did everything correctly.
